meanings.sent1: The unleavened bread was flat and simple.
meanings.sent2: During Passover, Jews eat unleavened bread called matzah.
meanings.sent3: The unleavened cake was so plain, it looked like a giant cracker.
meanings.sent4: Her unleavened cookies were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent5: The unleavened dough felt dense and heavy in my hands.

meanings.sent1: The unleavened pizza crust was thin and crispy.
meanings.sent2: The unleavened pancakes were surprisingly fluffy.
meanings.sent3: He tried to make unleavened bread, but it turned out like a rock.
meanings.sent4: The unleavened muffins rose beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent5: The unleavened dough lacked the usual lightness of bread.

meanings.sent1: The unleavened grape juice tasted sweet and fresh.
meanings.sent2: She preferred unleavened beer over the traditional kind.
meanings.sent3: The unleavened wine had a unique tangy flavor.
meanings.sent4: His unleavened cider was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The unleavened drink bubbled with natural goodness.
